pages.text: The old tales are true, and you've just angered the Cold Snap Horde into tearing open a small interdimensional window to leak back into the overworld. The materials they drop can be used to make magical items however.. You can upgrade a snow globe with some of these materials as well. Will you agitate the horde further?
Summons a tier 2 horde. Must be summoned in a cold or neutral temperature environment (Unless otherwise configured), or in a swamp biome.
